item.description:
We will rent out a studio for an hour then we can hit the main stage. The purpose of the private studio first is twofold, first there will be a $10 cover charge anyway just for the stage and we can have a few drinks before we hit the main stage i.e. liquid courage...


The price of admission into the studio is $12 per person, and it will have to be reserved with a credit card so if you signup please make sure that you can come.
item.how_to_find_us: I will post more info as the day draws near and i have an idea of how many people will bw coming.
item.name: Karaoke Night
